Muscular O O
dystrophy O O
is O O
a O O
fatal O O
illness O O
in O O
which O O
the O O
body O O
's O O
muscle O O
tissue O O
degenerates O O
and O O

by O O
fat O O
. O O

Death O O
strikes O O
in O O
early O O
adulthood O O
. O O

Individuals O O
with O O
the O O
disease O O
have O O
a O O
non-working O O
version O O
of O O
a O O
gene O O
responsible O O
for O O
producing O O
a O O
crucial O O

protein O O
called O O

. O O

In O O
the O O
study O O
at O O
the O O
University O O

Institute O B-ORG
for O I-ORG
Human O I-ORG

Therapy O I-ORG

to O O

00 O O

of O O

muscle O O

weeks O O

needed O O
to O O
make O O

of O O
